summary: Noldorian Ranger armour provides a standalone full set of lore-friendly and highly detailed light female armour.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sEoXY9Ol.jpg[/IMG]

About the Mod

The Noldorian Ranger Armour is a true work of heart for me, since I always wanted to create a really noble female Ranger armour to give well travelled female characters of noble heritage the proper look - a good looking and practical armour with fine and elegant metal, fur and leather parts.

It features cuirass, gloves, boots and two different hoods and is craftable at any forge under the Elven category and is fully temperable and enchantable. This set is very mashup friendly and will look good with items of my other "Noldorian" mods as well as with other armour mods or vanilla armour pieces. Creativity always finds a way to shine...

If you are looking for a perfectly fitting weapon you might like this :

[URL=http://imgur.com/hdXZjs7][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hdXZjs7s.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32656]Noldorian Royal Elven Bow and Quiver - Standalone[/url]

About the looks of it images can say more than thousand words of mine - especially since I had the honour to be able to get some of the greatest screenarchers on the Nexus as beta testers for my work. Be sure to check out their remarkable work in the gallery on this front page and in the image section of this mod. In addition I can recommend to watch the following great review videos.

by mattyb89

[youtube]-Ma8XBSAPk0[/youtube]
by lemonman131


Requirements

Skyrim 1.8 is required for this mod to work.


Installation

Download the mod file and extract the file into your skyrim directory, e.g. C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonskyrimData and say "yes" when being asked to integrate and override.


Un-installation

Delete the file via NMM or manually by deactivating the "NDranger.esp" and deleting the "NDrangerArmor" folder within your Skyrim "Textures" and "meshes" folders.

Credits

Credits go to...

- my friend TomAraya for the professional game implementation
- my friend Grace Darkling for her permission to create this retexture of her wonderful [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7184]Ranger Armor[/url]
- Cabal120 for his creative input which may be seen in an alternative version of this mod
- Bethesda for creating the gaming masterpiece Skyrim
- Professor Tolkien who made a fact-loving lawyer and historician believe in magic again, the day I discovered his unique and ever outstanding work back in 2001
- Peter Jackson and WETA Workshop for being a great inspiration for this mod
- Lana del Rey, Howard Shore, Harry Gregson-Williams, Richard Wagner, Giacomo Puccini and others for helping me through endless hours of modding work

and last but absolutely not least to my fantastic group of beta testers :

The gallery on this front page is a tribute to YOU and your contribution, your friendly help and encouragement and as well to your inspiring and outstanding screenarchery work. THANK YOU SO MUCH!


Permissions

You are not allowed to use any assets of this mod whithout my permission.

Gallery

Now, after so much reading you really deserve the visual joyride provided by my wonderful Beta testers. Be sure to check out their other work here on the Nexus ( links to their work can be found in the "Credits" section. Enjoy it!

Author's note :

If you like this mod please take a second to show your apprechiation, leave a comment or load up a picture - I'd be really grateful for it, since I have put many hours of work and a lot of determination into it. If you face any issues please let me know, so that we may find a solution together.
author: EcthelionOtW
